segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted by the mess created by the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, creating a puddle around the woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman is completely absorbed in drying a plate, not noticing the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to make a bigger mess if he falls from that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not helping to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman looks up soon and sees the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is about to tip over, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of disgust watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to damage the floor and cabinets if it's not cleaned up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how oblivious the woman is to the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
